snippet: The city said the operator had been trying to lift a load more than twice the crane’s capacity at a construction site in Long Island City.
lead_paragraph: The city said the operator had been trying to lift a load more than twice the crane’s capacity at a construction site in Long Island City.

headline.seo: City Suspends Operator’s License After Crane Accident in Queens
headline.main: City Suspends License of Operator in Queens Crane Collapse
headline.print_headline: City Suspends License of Operator in Queens Crane Collapse
